name: Files by Google Safe Folder Encrypted File
summary: An FGSF file is a file that has been encrypted and renamed by Files by Google, a file management app for Android and ChromeOS devices. It was encrypted and renamed when moved to Files by Google's Safe folder. Typically, an FGSF file contains a sensitive document, photo, or video that a user wanted to protect from others who might use their device.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
